title: PM offers condolences to Mian Marghoob on his wife’s demise
content:
LAHORE, Oct 26 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Sunday morning visited the residence of Pakistan Muslim League-N leader Mian Marghoob Ahmad and expressed his condolence over the demise of his wife.

The Prime Minister prayed for the departed soul and elevation in her ranks.

He also conveyed heartfelt sympathies to the bereaved family and prayed that may Allah Almighty grant them courage and patience to bear this irreparable loss.
